text: Ross Carl "Rocky" Anderson (born September 9, 1951) is an American attorney and politician. He served two terms as the 33rd mayor of Salt Lake City, Utah, from 2000 to 2008. He is the executive director of High Road for Human Rights. He ran for President of the United States in the 2012 U.S. presidential election. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Mayors of Salt Lake City Category:Politicians from Utah Category:2012 United States presidential candidates Category:People from Logan, Utah
title: Rocky Anderson
